item.title: Medal of Freedom ceremony for Charlie Kirk being held at White House
item.description: Trump has hailed the Turning Point USA founder "a giant of his generation" and a "martyr for American freedom."

item.title: US conducts another lethal strike on alleged drug boat off Venezuela, Trump says
item.description: Trump says he ordered another military strike of a boat off the coast of Venezuela in what appears to be the fifth such strike in the Caribbean Sea, k...

item.title: WATCH: Social media is hurting kids' test scores: Study
item.description: Kids who use social media score lower on reading and memory tests, a new study from the Journal of the American Medical Association found.

item.title: LIVE: Trump posthumously awards Charlie Kirk the Presidential Medal of Freedom
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: Cartels issuing bounties up to $50,000 for hits on ICE, CBP agents: DHS
item.description: Drug cartels have "disseminated a structured bounty program to incentivize violence against federal personnel," according to a press release from DHS.
